resources.string: Do you want to reset this CheckList?
The report was saved to PDF
Fill these fields to complete the report
Photo was saved to the device storage
Do you want to add photos to the report?
Maximum Limit of 7 Text Lines was Reached
Additional comment cannot contain more than 5 lines
1. Identify the product: check the name, identification number, code, marking, etc.
2. Check that all the previous control points are completed, previously identified nonconformities (if any) are eliminated and nonconformity reports are closed.
3. Check the availability of documentation / markings confirming the acceptance of parts and assemblies by the technical control department of the enterprise.
4. Check the availability of the appropriate design, production and technological documentation.
5. Check the availability and validity period of certificates of the personnel performing the process and documentary confirmation of admission to work.
6. Check the availability of certification of engineers who supervise the works and documentary confirmation of admission to work.
7. Check the availability of certified tools used in the control.
8. Check that the parameters of the equipment, instrumentation and fixtures correspond to the process.
9. Check the availability and implementation of maintenance plans for the equipment and instrumentation used.
10. Check that the materials used are certified and meet the requirements specified in the production and technological documentation.
11. Check the availability of an agreed heat treatment technology at the workplace.
12. Check the availability of records indicating that performers are familiar with the technological documentation.
13. Check that the actual location of the thermocouples complies with the requirements of the technological documentation.
14. Check the compliance of the heat treatment start temperature with the requirements of the technological documentation.
15. Check compliance of the temperature rise rate with the requirements of technological documentation.
16. Check the compliance of the temperature holding time with the requirements of the technological documentation.
17. Check the compliance of cooling conditions with the requirements of technological documentation.
18. Check that the dimensions of the product after the process comply with the requirements of the design documentation.
19. Check that there are no surface defects on the product.
20. Check that the documents drawn up based on the results of the technological process are completed in full in accordance with the requirements of regulatory documentation.
1. Identify the product: check the name, identification number, code, marking, etc.
2. Check that all the previous control points are completed, previously identified nonconformities (if any) are eliminated and nonconformity reports are closed.
3. Check the availability of documentation / markings confirming the acceptance of parts and assemblies by the technical control department of the enterprise.
4. Check the availability of the appropriate design, production and technological documentation.
5. Check the performance of the qualification tests (forming of the adjusting item).
6. Check the availability and validity period of certificates of the personnel performing the process and documentary confirmation of admission to work.
7. Check the availability of certification of engineers who supervise the works and documentary evidence of admission to work.
8. Check the availability of certified tools used in the control.
9. Check that the parameters of the equipment, instrumentation and fixtures correspond to the process.
10. Check the availability and implementation of maintenance plans for the equipment and instrumentation used.
11. Check that the materials used are certified and meet the requirements specified in the production and technological documentation.
12. Check the availability of an agreed forming technology at the workplace.
13. Check the availability of records indicating that performers are familiar with the technological documentation.
14. Check that the process is carried out in accordance with the requirements of production and technological documentation.
15. Check the compliance of the forming end temperature with the technological documentation (for the hot forming).
16. Check that the dimensions of the product after the process comply with the requirements of the design documentation.
17. Check that there are no surface defects on the product.
18. Check that the marking complies with the requirements of the design documentation.
19. Check that the documents drawn up based on the results of the technological process are completed in full in accordance with the requirements of regulatory documentation.
